sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SCFIWITZ, . or Switz, a canton of Swisserland, which gives name to them all. It is bounded on the weſt by the lake of the four cantons, on the ſouth by the canton of Uri, on the eaſt by that of Glaris, and on the north by thoſe of Zurich and Zug. Its principal riches conſiſt in cattle, and the capital town is of the ſame name. This is a large, handſome place, ſeated near the lake of the four cantons, in a pleaſant country among the mountains. E. Long. 8. 41. N. Lat. 47. 2.
